product_name: Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch Long Underwear Bottoms - Women's
long_description: Designed for active sports in cool weather, the women's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch long underwear bottoms are a great option for days when even lightweight base layers are too hot. Stretchy, quick-drying and moisture wicking, the polyester and spandex fabric offers very light insulation against skin. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Fabric treatment helps deter odors. Brushed elastic waistband won't irritate skin. Gusseted crotch allows freedom of movement. Offset seams enhance mobility without chafing. Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch long underwear bottoms feature a slim fit.
short_description: Designed for active sports in cool weather, the women's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch long underwear bottoms are a great option for days when even lightweight base layers are too hot.
